product_name: Zojirushi Tuff Sports Vacuum Bottle - 1 Liter
long_description: The 1-liter Zojirushi Tuff Sports vacuum bottle has a clever pull-up/snap-down handle for easy carrying and compact storage. Stainless-steel interior and exterior promise uncompromising durability. Vacuum insulation provides excellent heat and cold retention; keeps drinks hot for up to 24 hrs. and cold for up to 6 hrs. Large mouth lets you add standard-size ice cubes to keep liquids cold. 1-touch, push-button stopper pops open on demand for easy pouring. Bottle top doubles as a cup. Zojirushi Tuff Sports vacuum bottle includes a carrying shoulder strap.
short_description: The 1-liter Zojirushi Tuff Sports vacuum bottle has a clever pull-up/snap-down handle for easy carrying and compact storage.
